alert.note: Alert for Loess Plains (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 2:37PM CDT until October 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR LOESS PLAINS... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM CDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * TIMING...Thursday afternoon and evening. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
